channel.title: ScottHansonDE tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from ScottHansonDE.

item.description: @ClaireSmith1848 Cool that Ausbildung and Studium exhibit together. The show we attend are all Ausbildung only. Our son now kind of wishes he had done Ausbildung instead of university.
@RealMarkDziak And the top candidate for Bundesliga relegation next year is‚Ä¶ Werder!
@RealMarkDziak @jrsofty Was it at least cold? Not always so easy to buy cold beer here.
Solche Spiele mit Verl√§ngerung und Elfmeter sind schlecht f√ºr die Nerven. Hoffentlich wird das Relegations-R√ºckspiel ein langweiliges Unentschieden. #DFBPokal
@RealMarkDziak Ralf Rangnick spoke at one of our national meetings while he was coaching at Leipzig. Strangely enough, it was just after we had started selling Red Bull.
@swaggoner Well my apps are updated now! üòÄ

Updated my month-old iPhone 12 to iOS 15.5 and all my non-Apple apps were borked (greyed out and ‚ÄúWaiting‚Ä¶‚Äù). Had to erase and restore from backup (and all banking and 2FA apps were reset). Annoying.

‚ÄúIt is foolish and childish, on the face of it, to affiliate ourselves with anything so insignificant and patently contrived and commercially exploitative as a professional sports team‚Äù https://t.co/PnWzYLPBEA
‚ÄúWhat is left out of this calculation, it seems to me, is the business of caring ‚Äî caring deeply and passionately, really caring ‚Äî which is a capacity or an emotion that has almost gone out of our lives.‚Äù RIP Roger Angell.
For me, coming from the sports-obsessed US, German sports fandom helped me understand my new home. BTW #nurderHSV
Diversity socks (diversity fries coming soon) https://t.co/0pZRVlbvoP
Markenbindung beginnt fr√ºh‚Ä¶ ‚ÄúMutter gibt Zweij√§hrigem ihr Handy zum Spielen ‚Äì und er bestellt 31 Cheeseburger bei McDonald‚Äôs‚Äù https://t.co/a7KfVN8Adt

My accomplishment for the day is fixing the flush on our in-wall toilet tank, which has been intermittently sticking for months. Once I dared to disassemble it, I found a loose piece of plastic inside the valve. Seems to work fine now. https://t.co/yyBh3qrKu3

@ClaireSmith1848 Club was started in the ‚Äò70s by kids who had played basketball in an AG at the local Gymnasium, and were turned away from existing sports clubs. Apparently they were Bob Marley fans.
@ClaireSmith1848 Rasta Vechta! üòÉ
Good news if you have a family domain for email at Google! https://t.co/jlk7DLLBqq

At Hannover Messe Hall 17 four complete test kitchens were set up for the hands-on management Customer Experience Event. Closed to the public, so you couldn‚Äôt see me very unsure on grill (I usually work fries üçü). I was impressed by the exhaust system! https://t.co/GZft4RoZvC
Good morning from the Expo-Plaza in Hannover! https://t.co/BIYrb0DYqt
Skipping #Eurovision this year, but those of you who do partake do have fun! Turning off Twitter in 3, 2, 1‚Ä¶

Already planning our 9 Euro train trip to the North Sea next month‚Ä¶ Cuxhaven, not Sylt! üòõ
Of course there are no hotels free in Cuxhaven on the weekend, so we‚Äòll bike 35 km eastward to a hotel then the next day 50 km further east to catch a train home
@tessaapproves Even rural Minnesota now has family-run Mexican restaurants, best thing ever!
@c0urtneyH I‚Äôm in the same position and I‚Äôve had no problems. BTW immigration has never checked my vax cards, only the airlines.
@swaggoner @40PercentGerman I see you with deep fried butter and raise you with a stick https://t.co/x8u1MqnaHT https://t.co/goAPu80h0q
@40PercentGerman Pretty sure this offends all sides of that discussion https://t.co/DzLzP9FYJM
@RealMarkDziak And what will she do with the papers? Fax them to another doctor?
@___jgl___ Keine Ahnung, wir betreiben laut Beh√∂rden ‚Äúeiner Speisewirtschaft mit der Betriebsart Imbisswirtschaft‚Äù
@Lynn_Nothegger You‚Äôve never experienced primal rage in a German supermarket queue?
